<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}> Set Console Certificate Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v32.04/settings/console-certificate"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"authConfiguration","saas":false,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



SetConsoleCertificateSettings sets the console certificate settings


## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"checkRevocation"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"CheckRevocation indicates whether cert revocation status is required.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"consoleCaCert"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ConsoleCACert is a custom CA certificate for the console.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>consoleCustomCert</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Secret Stores the plain and encrypted version of a value. The plain version is not stored in a database

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"encrypted"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies an encrypted value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"plain"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies the plain text value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>hpkp</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

HPKPSettings represents the public key pinning settings

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"certs"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Certs are the public certs used for fingerprinting.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":".\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"fingerprints"} required={false} schemaName={"string (string)[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"SHA256 fingerprints of the certificates.\n","items":{"type":"string","title":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK
